name: Muscle Coach
description:
Muscle Coach is a VR experience for lovers of muscles and fashion. Grab and pose your pro bodybuilder using the Vive controllers.

Watch the trailer.

Design and Code: Peter Javidpour

Art and Animation: Ricky Jonsson Jr

Follow us for updates as we bring this muscle museum to life for all to enjoy!

What's next for Muscle Coach?
This is our prototype. We're going to keep building out this flexperience to include:

  • Bodybuilder customization
  • Muscle pumping AND dumping
  • Photoshoot directing
